title: Add OpenCode tool support to tools.json
description:
OpenCode is completely missing from tools.json. Should support:
- Guidelines: AGENTS.md in project root/subdirs
- Commands: .opencode/command/*.md (local), ~/.config/opencode/command/*.md (global)
- Skills: .opencode/skill/<name>/SKILL.md (local), ~/.opencode/skill/<name>/SKILL.md (global)
- Global guidelines: ~/.config/opencode/AGENTS.md
- Also loads .claude/skills/*/SKILL.md

title: Add Amp Code tool support to tools.json
description:
Amp Code is completely missing from tools.json. Should support:
- Guidelines: AGENTS.md (fallback to AGENT.md, CLAUDE.md) in CWD/parents/subtrees
- Commands: .agents/commands/* (local), ~/.config/amp/commands/* (global)
- Global guidelines: ~/.config/amp/AGENTS.md and ~/.config/AGENTS.md
- Respects XDG_CONFIG_HOME when set

title: Add Codex skills configuration
description:
Codex exists in tools.json but has no skills config. Should support:
- Skills: .codex/skills in repo (CWD/parent/root)
- Global skills: $CODEX_HOME/skills (default ~/.codex/skills), /etc/codex/skills

title: Respect CODEX_HOME environment variable
description:
tool-conventions.md mentions $CODEX_HOME for Codex, but code only hardcodes ~/.codex. Need to:
- Check CODEX_HOME env var first
- Fallback to ~/.codex if not set
- Apply to both guidelines and skills paths

title: Support wildcard patterns for multi-file discovery
description:
Current implementation only supports exact filenames (discovery.go:67-77). Many tools use wildcard patterns:
- Claude: .claude/commands/*.md, .claude/rules/*.md
- Gemini: .gemini/commands/*.toml
- Amp Code: .agents/commands/*

Need to implement glob pattern matching in file discovery.

title: Implement hierarchical discovery (upward search)
description:
Current discovery only searches downward from CWD (discovery.go:19-36). Tools specify upward search:
- Gemini: searches CWD/parents/subdirs up to .git root
- Amp Code: searches CWD/parents/subtrees

Need to implement parent directory traversal for context discovery.

title: Extend skills discovery for additional tools
description:
Skills discovery only supports .claude/skills (discovery.go:232-248). Should also support:
- Codex: .codex/skills (local), $CODEX_HOME/skills (global)
- OpenCode: .opencode/skill/ (local), ~/.opencode/skill/ (global)

Need to extend discoverSkills() and related functions.

title: Support file variant fallback logic
description:
Some tools support multiple filenames for the same purpose:
- Codex: AGENTS.md OR AGENTS.override.md
- Amp Code: AGENTS.md (fallback to AGENT.md, CLAUDE.md)
- Claude: CLAUDE.md OR .claude/CLAUDE.md

Need to implement fallback/priority logic for file discovery.

title: Add missing global paths to tools.json
description:
Missing global paths in tools.json globalGuidelines:
- ~/.claude/rules/ (Claude hierarchical rules global location)

Some are present (~/.claude/CLAUDE.md, ~/.config/opencode/AGENTS.md, ~/.config/amp/AGENTS.md).

title: Add Claude hierarchical rules directory support
description:
tool-conventions.md specifies .claude/rules/*.md for Claude hierarchical rules, but:
- Not configured in tools.json (Claude has dir: '' for guidelines)
- Only supports single CLAUDE.md file

Need to add Claude rules directory config to tools.json and implement discovery.

title: Add Gemini commands configuration
description:
Gemini exists in tools.json but has no commands config. Should support:
- Commands: <project>/.gemini/commands/*.toml (local)
- Global commands: ~/.gemini/commands/*.toml

title: Add legacy file format support
description:
Legacy file formats not supported:
- Cursor: .cursorrules (legacy format)
- Claude: .claude/CLAUDE.md (alternative location)

These are mentioned in tool-conventions.md but not implemented.
